Yeah, inoue nanaki definitely has good taste, but the artstyle is just horrendous.

Ok I'm all for trashy NTR story even though I hate them, but these ones are the same stories. Different girls, different boyfriend, but it's always the same predicament, for some reason this feels like the author is just writing what happened to him in one of his relationship.
There is nothing better in this world than transformation into gyaru ntr. Great stories, more entertaining than heartbreaking.

Forget the ntr, trashy whores, or the mind control for a sec; but my god this act is just so fucking H O R R E N D O U S. Like this is the shit someone should look at to kill their boner when someone's about to walk in on them. The nipples, ahegao face, the shading,  how most panels have them as if they're facing you, the anatomy altogether; ew. Just no...
